item.title: 7-Line Zipline Experience in Sevierville
item.description: Experience the Great Smoky Mountains of Tennessee from the point of view of the treetops during this thrilling zipline excursion. Get your adrenaline pumping as soar through the trees on a series of ziplines and cross several rope bridges. This adventure is sure to have you laughing and perhaps screaming on the way down.

item.title: Famous Moonshine & Wine Tour From Pigeon Forge
item.description: Discover a variety of Tennessee's moonshine and wine distilleries on a half-day tour from Sevierville. Your guide shares the history of moonshine and prohibition, tastings of wine and moonshine, and details about local breweries and distilleries. Visit multiple moonshine distilleries and wineries, in Sevierville and Pigeon Forge, and enjoy tastings at each venue.

image.alt: Famous Moonshine & Wine Tour From Pigeon Forge

item.title: Small-Group 7-Line Zipline Activity at Sevierville Nature Park
item.description: Take in the beauty of Sevierville Nature Park from new heights with this private zipline tour. With the Smoky Mountains as a backdrop, this 2,500-foot-long tour covers seven separate ziplines and sees guests travel up to 50mph. One for adventure lovers, as well as frequent visitors to the area looking to do something new, each tour is guided by a zipline professional who’ll point out areas of interest along your journey.

image.alt: Small-Group 7-Line Zipline Activity at Sevierville Nature Park

item.title: Douglas Lake View Scenic Helicopter Tour
item.description: Fly high above the Tennessee countryside on this helicopter tour over the French Broad River, Douglas Lake, and the Great Smoky Mountains. Gain a new perspective on the landscape as your helicopter weaves through the air and you learn what makes the area unique through guided narration from your pilot.

image.alt: Douglas Lake View Scenic Helicopter Tour

item.title: Extended Douglas Lake Region Tour by Helicopter
item.description: Fly high above the Tennessee countryside on this helicopter tour over the French Broad River, Douglas Lake, and the Great Smoky Mountains. Extra elevation gains guarantee broader views of the surrounding landscape with a focus on Douglas Lake and the Douglas Dam, while the included headsets make it easy to communicate with your pilot and hear about the sights as you weave through the sky.

image.alt: Extended Douglas Lake Region Tour by Helicopter

item.title: Ridge Runner Smoky Mountain Helicopter Tour
item.description: See the Smoky Mountains in their full, rolling glory on a 15-minute helicopter tour. Rise above historic downtown Sevierville and catch a glimpse of Pigeon Forge and Tennessee Valley from the air before swooping over the majestic Chilhowee Mountain Range. Get a bird’s-eye view of vast, undeveloped swaths of Smoky Mountain National Park, soaring just above the treetops and cresting over the sheer cliffs of Bluff Mountain and Sugarloaf Mountain. It's an unforgettable way to experience the beauty of one of America's great mountain ranges.

image.alt: Ridge Runner Smoky Mountain Helicopter Tour

item.title: The Smoky Mountain Valley Adventure by Helicopter
item.description: Fly high above the Great Smoky Mountains on this helicopter tour over the Tennessee countryside. See a broad 24 mile range of undeveloped mountains, including Bluff Mountain and Sugar Loaf Mountain, and learn about the environment through narration from your pilot as you weave through the sky.

image.alt: The Smoky Mountain Valley Adventure by Helicopter

item.title: Scenic Helicopter Tour of Wears Valley, Tennessee
item.description: See Wears Valley from above on a scenic helicopter tour from Sevierville. Your pilot takes you over this gorgeous section of the Great Smoky Mountains National Park, one of the most popular nature destinations in Tennessee. Look for landmarks such as Cove Mountain, Waldens Creek, and the Bluff Mountain foothills, and hear in-flight commentary from your pilot via 2-way headsets. The helicopter covers about 36 miles (58km) of terrain on a flight that lasts about 18 minutes.

image.alt: Scenic Helicopter Tour of Wears Valley, Tennessee

item.title: Sights of Smoky Mountains, Real Local History
item.description: The Smoky Mountains are known for their beautiful nature, but the history and culture of the area also run deep. Learn about the founders of Gatlinburg, the old mill at Pigeon Forge, and head up the mountain to Rockefeller Memorial. Then, enjoy having your 1-hour lunch break in Wears Valley at Elvira's Cafe, and more on this fully narrated day-long tour from Pigeon Forge.

image.alt: Sights of Smoky Mountains, Real Local History

item.title: Cades Cove Sightseeing Bus Tour from Pigeon Forge
item.description: Heavy traffic can take away from the fun of driving the 11-mile (17.7 kilometer) Cades Cove loop. This guided bus tour offers a low-stress alternative to taking your own car, plus provides the benefit of guided commentary so you get more out of the trip than just a chance to admire mountain scenery.

image.alt: Cades Cove Sightseeing Bus Tour from Pigeon Forge

item.title: Digital Ocean Adventure in Sevierville
item.description: Introducing this digital ocean journey in Sevierville, a family-friendly digital experience that transports you into the depths of the ocean without getting wet. This is a first-of-its-kind adventure in the Smoky Mountains that blends a walk-through experience with immersive storytelling, interactives, and CGI animation. You’ll explore captivating underwater landscapes, interact with incredible sea creatures, and get to enjoy the spectacle of the deep blue sea. If you’re ready, to this digital ocean journey will take you on an unforgettable expedition where you’ll learn intriguing facts about sea life and leave with a newfound appreciation for the ocean's beauty.

item.title: New Improved Smoky Mountain Holiday Light Spectacular
item.description: Experience Gatlinburg’s holiday spirit with ease on a comfortable, heated bus. Travel to four different cities and hear stories of local Christmas traditions from your guide. Make stops at a dancing light show, a petting zoo, Winterfest celebrations, Old Mill, the Dolly statue, and more Enjoy samples of hot cocoa and coffee throughout the tour.

image.alt: New Improved Smoky Mountain Holiday Light Spectacular

item.title: Trees of Many Colors Tour from Pigeon Forge
item.description: See the beauty of vivid fall leaves cresting the Great Smoky Mountains on this 5-hour tour from Pigeon Forge. Visit a remote location far from the crowds of easier-to-find viewing platforms and learn about the local culture and ecosystem as you go.

image.alt: Trees of Many Colors Tour from Pigeon Forge

item.title: Helicopter Ride in Smoky Mountain Sevierville Great Smoky Tour
item.description:
The Smoky Mountain Great Smoky ride is the ultimate adventure and the pinnacle of tours offered in Tennessee! If you’re searching for a tour that lets you see it all, your quest ends here. This is the ultimate experience, showcasing the beauty of The Great Smoky Mountains, Downtown Sevierville, Pigeon Forge, and Gatlinburg.
The ride begins with the awe-inspiring Douglas Lake Dam before reaching the sparkling expanse of Douglas Lake.
Continuing on, you'll experience breathtaking views of Wears Valley, the iconic Mt. Le Conte, and the majestic Great Smoky Mountains.
As your adventure unfolds, we’ll make our way to the heart of downtown Sevierville, offering you a unique perspective of this charming town. Then, it’s time to discover the vibrant Pigeon Forge Strip, home to iconic attractions.
Your journey concludes with an exhilarating flight over Bluff Mountain, a thrilling experience that will leave you with memories that truly soar.

image.alt: Helicopter Ride in Smoky Mountain Sevierville Great Smoky Tour

item.title: Helicopter Ride in Smoky Mountain Sevierville Douglas Lake Tour
item.description:
The Smoky Mountain Douglas Lake Ride is the ultimate experience in the heart of the Smoky Mountains! When you’re exploring the delights of Pigeon Forge and Gatlinburg, you simply can’t miss the breathtaking beauty of Douglas Lake, boasting an impressive 500 miles of unspoiled shoreline. Now, imagine the sheer magnificence of Douglas Lake as it unfolds beneath you, from a soaring altitude of 1,000 feet, all while you relax in the comfort and style of our helicopter.
As you take to the skies, your gaze will be drawn not only to the captivating Douglas Lake but also to the distant Smoky Mountains, creating a spellbinding backdrop for your journey. Prepare to be entranced as you savor the panoramic view of the French Broad River, the glistening waters of Douglas Lake, the commanding Douglas Lake Dam, and, most notably, the iconic Great Smoky Mountains.
Secure your spot today and embark on an adventure that promises to be the highlight of your Smoky Mountains visit!

image.alt: Helicopter Ride in Smoky Mountain Sevierville Douglas Lake Tour

item.title: Helicopter Ride in Smoky Mountain Sevierville Intro Flight
item.description:
The Intro helicopter ride isn't just any ride; it's your express ticket to the skies of the Smoky Mountains and back. Ideal for those experiencing their first helicopter adventure or seeking a quick, pulse-pounding thrill, this ride offers affordability without compromising on the extraordinary. Picture yourself stepping into your private helicopter, ready to embark on a journey that's as thrilling as it is accessible.
The ride treats you to a jaw-dropping 180-degree turn above Soaky Water Park, offering an awe-inspiring aerial view of the vibrant Smoky Mountains and Sevierville. Familiar places take on a whole new charm from this vantage point, and it's a ride that opens up the joy of helicopter flight to everyone.
Families and aviation newcomers frequently choose the Smoky Mountain Intro ride, providing a perfect opportunity to earn your wings and relish the exhilaration of flight.

image.alt: Helicopter Ride in Smoky Mountain Sevierville Intro Flight

item.title: The Ultimate Jet Boat Adventure in Smoky Mountains
item.description: Join us for the ultimate jet boat tour in the Smoky Mountains. This tour combines all three of our tours into one. Witness the Douglas Dam, a key piece of American history located on the picturesque French Broad River. Jet through the Seven Islands State Park and try to spot some of the over 200 different species of birds that enhabit this wildlife sanctuary. As you're cruising down the river, watch out for river otters, deer and coyotes along the bank. Expect amazing views of the beautiful Great Smoky Mountains! Whether you're a history buff, a nature lover, or simply looking for a unique adventure, our tour offers something for everyone.

image.alt: The Ultimate Jet Boat Adventure in Smoky Mountains

item.title: Helicopter Ride in Smoky Mountain Sevierville Mountain Jumper
item.description:
The Mountain Jumper Ride is a fan-favorite and the ultimate way to experience the breathtaking beauty of Tennessee’s majestic mountains. If you’re seeking an adventure that offers the best of Sevierville, Pigeon Forge, and unparalleled mountain vistas, your search ends here.
The true showstopper of this tour is the unrivaled mountain scenery. Our Mountain Jumper tour propels you between Wears Valley and Bluff Mountain, allowing passengers to savor panoramic views of the Smoky Mountains.
But here’s where the magic truly happens – we don’t just fly near the mountains; we soar directly over them! There’s no better way to witness the breathtaking mountain range than from high above, as you traverse the very peaks and valleys that make the Smoky Mountains legendary.
Get ready to witness the stunning Smoky Mountains like never before and do not miss out on this extraordinary journey.

image.alt: Helicopter Ride in Smoky Mountain Sevierville Mountain Jumper

item.title: Private Helicopter Ride in Smoky Mountain Sevierville Quick Hop
item.description:
The Smoky Mountain Quick Hop Ride is the perfect adventure for first-time riders and thrill-seekers alike. This exhilarating tour covers approximately 10 miles of pure excitement, offering an unforgettable experience that leaves you craving more.
As you buckle in and prepare for takeoff, the Little Pigeon River beckons below, winding its way through the picturesque landscape. The lively downtown of Sevierville comes to life before your eyes, with all its charm and hidden treasures unveiled from high above.
But what sets the Smoky Mountain Quick Hop Ride apart is the grand finale – a breathtaking panoramic view of the majestic Smoky Mountains. Witness the rugged beauty of these iconic peaks in all their glory, an awe-inspiring sight that will stay with you long after you’ve touched down.
Quick, fun, and nothing short of exhilarating, this ride is designed to make every second count. It’s an adventure that delivers an unforgettable taste of the skies and leaves riders wanting more.

image.alt: Private Helicopter Ride in Smoky Mountain Sevierville Quick Hop
